/**
 @page DAC_Async_2CH_Interrupt

 @verbatim
 * @file    DAC/Async_2CH_Interrupt/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2019-05-28
 * @brief   Description of DAC.
 @endverbatim

@par Example Description:

This example describes how to use HT32 DAC Asynchronous. DAC's channel0 output of 12-bit scaler 1.65v, and DAC's channel1 output of 8-bit scaler 1.65v.

@par Directory Contents:

- DAC/Async_2CH_Interrupt/main.c               Main program
- DAC/Async_2CH_Interrupt/ht32fxxxx_it.c       Interrupt handlers

@par Hardware and Software Environment:

- This example can be run on HT32 Series development board.
- Please observe the DAC's voltage change through the oscilloscope.
